snippet: Learning that one pitch is probably the most important thing Michael Pineda will do in spring training, and the early returns have been positive.
abstract: Spring training efforts by New York Yankees pitcher Michael Pineda to add a changeup to his arsenal of pitches are showing positive returns.
lead_paragraph: Learning that one pitch is probably the most important thing Michael Pineda will do in spring training, and the early returns have been positive.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Pineda Begins Work on Changeup Immediately
headline.main: Yankees Think That for Pineda, Changeup Is in Good (and Big) Hands
headline.print_headline: Yankees Think That for Pineda, Changeup Is in Good (and Big) Hands
